results.definition: having or feeling no doubt or uncertainty; confident and assured
examples: was sure (or certain) she had seen it

results.definition: certain to occur; destined or inevitable
examples: In this life nothing is certain but death and taxes

results.definition: exercising or taking care great enough to bring assurance
examples: be certain to disconnect the iron when you are through

results.definition: definite but not specified or identified
examples: set aside a certain sum each week
certain breeds do not make good pets
certain members have not paid their dues

results.definition: established beyond doubt or question; definitely known
examples: what is certain is that every effect must have a cause
it is certain that they were on the bus
the date for the invasion is certain
